name: venusaurite
effect: Held: Allows Venusaur to Mega Evolve into Mega Venusaur.
short_effect: Held: Allows Venusaur to Mega Evolve into Mega Venusaur.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Venusaur hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
